meanings.sent1: She enjoys prevuing the menu before going to the restaurant.
meanings.sent2: I always like prevuing the questions before a test.
meanings.sent3: He was prevuing the weather forecast before planning the picnic.
meanings.sent4: The detective was prevuing the evidence to solve the case.
meanings.sent5: Prevuing the map helped them navigate the unfamiliar city.

meanings.definition: To look at or consider in advance.
meanings.sent1: Before making a decision, she spends time prevuing all the options.
meanings.sent2: Prevuing the schedule helps in organizing the day efficiently.
meanings.sent3: He was prevuing the movie trailers to decide which one to watch.
meanings.sent4: She was prevuing the different paint colors for her room makeover.
meanings.sent5: Prevuing the ingredients before cooking saves time in the kitchen.
